name: Witch-a-brewing
description:
It's so easy to work as a potion maker when you remember every potion recipe by heart. This does not apply to Unona.

Fortunately, she has a musical Hat and ... you!

Help the witch to collect reagents and brew a potion in a rhythm game with cooking elements.

♥♥♥ Witch-a-brewing is a rhytm game with cooking elements ♥♥♥

Unona is a young potion maker in the family shop.

However, she does not remember a single recipe. In order not to completely lose customers, a magic Hat helps the girl in cooking potions. With one condition: mistakes in cooking are unacceptable.

♥♥♥ Game controls in the first level ♥♥♥

RUN INTO THE REAGENT — reagent collection;

WAD — character movement;

MOUSE MOVEMENT —  camera movement;

♥♥♥ Game controls in the second level ♥♥♥

WASD — character movement;

E —  ladder movement;

SPACEBAR —  jump;

TAB — camera zoom;

MOUSE MOVEMENT —  camera movement;

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON —  throw reagent;

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON —  grab/catch reagent;

♥♥♥ User Interface ♥♥♥

allows you to understand the order in which the reagents should enter the boiler allows you to go from level 1 to level 2
